Class Display

java.lang.Object
game.display.Display
public class Display extends Object
Class which implements token and tile displaying on terminal

    • displayTileEnv

      public StringBuilder displayTileEnv(Tile tile, Map.Entry<HashMap<Tile,Token>,Position> entry, AnimalColor color, Token token)
      This method displays a tile with no color if no token is placed and a colored tile in the other case
      Parameters:
      tile - Tile of an environment
      entry - Environment converted in a entry
      color - Color : blank (no token) ; token
      token - Token of an environement,
      Returns:
      Stringbuilder which contains the ASCII of a tile

    • displayEnvPlayer

      public void displayEnvPlayer(Environment env, DisplayTools grid, Player player)
      This method displays the environment (tiles and tokens) of a player
      Parameters:
      env - Player's environment
      grid - Player's grid (tiles and tokens)
      player - Player data

    • displayChoiceMod

      public int displayChoiceMod(Scanner scanner)
      This method displays the mode for the final score count in this game
      Parameters:
      scanner - choice of 1st player
      Returns:
      int: family mode 1 or Intermediate mode 2, default 1
